Structs/GetIdentityResult.html#/s:6Solan.name: identity
Structs/GetIdentityResult.html#/s:6Solan.abstract: The identity pubkey of the current node.

Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.name: lamports
Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.abstract: Number of lamports assigned to this account.

Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.name: owner
Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.abstract: Pubkey of the program this account has been assigned to.

Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.name: data
Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.abstract: Data associated with the account, may be binary blobs or JSON that must be decoded separately.

Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.name: executable
Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.abstract: Indicates if the account owns a program.

Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.name: rentEpoch
Structs/AccountInfo.html#/s:6Solana11Acc.abstract: The epoch at which this account will next owe rent.

Structs/RawDataCodingError.html.name: RawDataCodingError
Structs/RawDataCodingError.html.abstract: The error a Solana SDK object throws when RawDataCoding fails.

Other%20Structs.html#/s:6Solana14Transac.name: TransactionKey
Other%20Structs.html#/s:6Solana14Transac.abstract: A key used to authorize a transaction or instruction.

Protocols/RawDataEncoding.html.name: RawDataEncoding
Protocols/RawDataEncoding.html.abstract: A protocol that indicates a data structure can be rendered as raw Data.

Protocols/RawDataDecoding.html.name: RawDataDecoding
Protocols/RawDataDecoding.html.abstract: A protocol that indicates a data structure can be rebuilt from only Data.

Other%20Protocols.html#/s:6Solana13RawDa.name: RawDataCoding
Other%20Protocols.html#/s:6Solana13RawDa.abstract: A protocol that inbdicates a data structure can be both rendered and rebuilt as Data.

Protocols/Transaction.html.name: Transaction
Protocols/Transaction.html.abstract: An ordered, atomic set of instructions to be applied on the Solana blockchain, along with basic information on how they should be signed.

Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.name: processed
Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.abstract: Query the most recent block which has reached 1 confirmation by the connected node.

Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.name: confirmed
Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.abstract: Query the most recent block which has reached 1 confirmation by the cluster.

Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.name: finalized
Enums/Commitment.html#/s:6Solana10Commit.abstract: Query the most recent block which has been finalized by the cluster.

Enums/Commitment.html.name: Commitment
Enums/Commitment.html.abstract: The level of commitment desired when querying state.

Classes/OptionalActor.html.name: OptionalActor
Classes/OptionalActor.html.abstract: A base class that supports Foundation-based locking and unlocking of contents, optionally forcing its method calls into an actor pattern.

Classes/RPCNetworkRequestAdaptor.html.name: RPCNetworkRequestAdaptor
Classes/RPCNetworkRequestAdaptor.html.abstract: The default RPC session behavior adaptor, which uses network requests to a node on the Solana blockchain.

Structs/NoKeyedBody.html.name: NoKeyedBody
Structs/NoKeyedBody.html.abstract: A structure to use to indicate that there is no key-value paired information that should accompany a JSON-RPC request.

Structs/GetInflationRewardResult.html#/s.name: effectiveSlot
Structs/GetInflationRewardResult.html#/s.abstract: The slot in which the rewards are effective.

Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.name: result
Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.abstract: The result of the RPC call, if it succeeded.

Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.name: error
Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.abstract: An error associated with the RPC call, if it failed.

Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.name: id
Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.abstract: The request identifier shared with the server.

Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.name: outcome
Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html#/s:6Solan.abstract: A Result typed object that shows either success or failure of the RPC call.

Structs/RPCResponseContext.html#/s:6Sola.name: slot
Structs/RPCResponseContext.html#/s:6Sola.abstract: The slot at which the operation was evaluated.

Structs/RPCResponseAndContext.html#/s:6S.name: context
Structs/RPCResponseAndContext.html#/s:6S.abstract: The contextual information corresponding to this RPC response

Structs/RPCResponseAndContext.html.name: RPCResponseAndContext
Structs/RPCResponseAndContext.html.abstract: A result body that consists of the context (slot information) and actual value result of a given operation.

Structs/RPCResponseContext.html.name: RPCResponseContext
Structs/RPCResponseContext.html.abstract: The contextual information corresponding to a given RPC response.

Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html.name: TaggedRPCResponse
Structs/TaggedRPCResponse.html.abstract: A JSON-RPC response, indicating either success or failure, wrapped in an identifier and specification version.

Structs/GetInflationRewardResult.html.name: GetInflationRewardResult
Structs/GetInflationRewardResult.html.abstract: The inflation reward for a list of addresses for an epoch.

Structs/LamportBalanceStatement.html.name: LamportBalanceStatement
Structs/LamportBalanceStatement.html.abstract: An address and the number of lamports in the account.

JSON-RPC%20Requests.html#/s:6Solana19RPC.name: RPCRequestKeyedBody
JSON-RPC%20Requests.html#/s:6Solana19RPC.abstract: The key-value paired information necessary to perform a given JSON-RPC request. This is encoded alongside the basic value to create an RPCRequestPayload that reflects the information necessary to perform the request.

Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.name: publisher(for:)
Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that responds to a given request. Since the request has not already been wrapped with TaggedRPCRequest, this will create an identifier and its tags internally.

Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.name: publisher(for:)
Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that responds to a given request.

Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.name: webSocketPublisher(for:)
Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that emits signals from a web socket task created for a given request. Since the request has not already been wrapped with TaggedRPCRequest, this will create an identifier and its tags internally.

Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.name: webSocketPublisher(for:)
Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html#/s:6Sol.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that emits signals from a web socket task created for a given request.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.name: Response
Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.abstract: The kind of response this request should receive back from a node after being made.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.name: Value
Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.abstract: The single-field-encoded value that forms the first part of this request’s RPCRequestPayload.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.name: KeyedBody
Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.abstract: The key-value paired information necessary to perform a given the request. This is encoded alongside the basic value to create an RPCRequestPayload that reflects the information necessary to perform the request.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.name: payload
Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.abstract: The RPCRequestPayload generated and sent to the server as params in your final tagged request. This contains both the basic single-field value provided and any key-value paired body information.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.name: methodName
Protocols/RPCRequest.html#/s:6Solana10RP.abstract: The string name of the method which will be queried.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: init(url:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Start a networked JSON-RPC session with a given node’s URL.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: init(adaptor:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Start a JSON-RPC session with a custom RPCRequestAdaptor conforming object. Use this initializer to build a custom debugging or testing pipeline.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: requestAdaptor
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: The active RPC Request Adapter used on this RPC Session. An RPCRequestAdaptor determines how RPC responses are sent through the Solana SDK. To build a custom debugging or testing pipeline, you can provide your own RPCRequestAdaptor conforming object.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: publisher(for:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that responds to a given request. Since the request has not already been wrapped with TaggedRPCRequest, this will create an identifier and its tags without user intervention.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: publisher(for:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that responds to a given request.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: webSocketPublisher(for:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that emits signals from a web socket task created for a given request. Since the request has not already been wrapped with TaggedRPCRequest, this will create an identifier and its tags internally.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: webSocketPublisher(for:)
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: Creates an automatically-connecting Combine publisher that emits signals from a web socket task created for a given request.

Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.name: transactionSafeModeEnabled
Classes/RPCSession.html#/s:6Solana10RPCS.abstract: When Transaction Safe Mode is enabled, the framework will attempt to validate transactions before they are submitted to the chain. If a transaction is potentially dangerous or has inconsistent signatures, the framework will trigger a precondition failure, abort the action, and allow you to investigate the error.

Classes/RPCSession.html.name: RPCSession
Classes/RPCSession.html.abstract: A session that handles communication with the Solana JSON-RPC API.

Structs/RPCNode.html.name: RPCNode
Structs/RPCNode.html.abstract: A node on the Solana network, addressable via JSON-RPC calls.

Protocols/RPCRequest.html.name: RPCRequest
Protocols/RPCRequest.html.abstract: The protocol Solana JSON-RPC requests must confrom to.

Structs/TaggedRPCRequest.html.name: TaggedRPCRequest
Structs/TaggedRPCRequest.html.abstract: The structure that wraps each JSON-RPC request made to a Solana node, providing it with necessary information about how the request should be performed and identified in responses.

Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html.name: RPCRequestAdaptor
Protocols/RPCRequestAdaptor.html.abstract: A protocol that represents the bridging logic betweeen a source of knowledge and a session that handles Solana JSON-RPC requests.

Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V4d.name: data
Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V4d.abstract: The underlying data the Base58 structure represents.

Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V9d.name: dataBytes
Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V9d.abstract: The underlying data the Base58 structure represents, in blocks of 8 bits.

Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V6s.name: init(string:)
Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V6s.abstract: Build a chunk of data from its string representation. If this string representation does not conform to Base 58, the initializer will fail.

Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V11.name: stringValue
Structs/Base58.html#/s:6Solana6Base58V11.abstract: The base58 string representation of the data.

General%20Types.html#/s:6Solana3RPCO.name: RPC
General%20Types.html#/s:6Solana3RPCO.abstract: The namespace for general utilities related to Solana JSON-RPC tasks.

Other%20Typealiases.html.name: Other Type Aliases
Other%20Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
